description.value:
You close your eyes to find your center. When you open them, you see the crime scene in a new light.

Level: 8
Category: Divination
Time: 10 minutes
Duration: Instantaneous
Component Cost: 125 gp
Market Price: 680 gp
Key Skill: Arcana

You cast your senses back through time to observe your current location as it was up to a number of hours ago no greater than your Arcana check result. You can observe the scene as if you were there, although you cannot affect anything.

Published in Eberron Player's Guide, page(s) 118.
